title: Website Maintenance
subtitle: Secure & up-to-date website
description: Comprehensive care plans to keep your site secure and fast.

faq.q1: What does the maintenance plan include?
faq.a1: Our plan includes weekly updates of plugins, themes, and WordPress core, daily off-site cloud backups, 24/7 uptime monitoring, security scans, and small content updates.
faq.q2: Do I really need a maintenance plan?
faq.a2: Yes. Just like a car needs oil changes, a website needs maintenance. Without it, your site becomes vulnerable to hackers, slow, and may break when meaningful hosting updates occur.
faq.a3: Absolutely. We believe in earning your business every month. There are no long-term lock-in contracts.
faq.q4: What if my site gets hacked?
faq.a4: If you are on our maintenance plan, we will fix your hacked site for free. We take preventing this very seriously.
